name: Swiftly Seditious
description: Swiftly Seditious  A Ninja Slash and Hack Action Game! Still in super beta just wanted to let a few people try if they want! There is currently 2 levels and just exploring the character for now! First level there is 3 Bears coming down Main Staircase , destroy them! Then 4 more Bears will spawn near your temple, in the Southwest Corner. The Stairs lead To Apple The Rotten's Sanctuary, which I have not made walkable just yet! Have fun and let me know any direction I should take the game! Thank you, NeckBeard OUT!
